title: Find largest number in an array
contentHtml:
Write a program to find largest number in an array

Input  : [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
Output : 5

#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
    int n,maxi=0;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    int arr[n];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        if(maxi<arr[i]){
            maxi=arr[i];
        }
    }
    printf("%d",maxi);
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    int n,maxi=0;
    cin>>n;
    int arr[n];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++) cin>>arr[i];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        maxi=max(maxi,arr[i]);
    }
    cout<<maxi<<'\n';
    return 0;
}

public class LargestInArrayExample{  
public static int getLargest(int[] a, int total){  
int temp;  
for (int i = 0; i < total; i++)   
        {  
            for (int j = i + 1; j < total; j++)   
            {  
                if (a[i] > a[j])   
                {  
                    temp = a[i];  
                    a[i] = a[j];  
                    a[j] = temp;  
                }  
            }  
        }  
       return a[total-1];  
}  
public static void main(String args[]){  
int a[]={1,2,3,4,5};  
  
System.out.println("Largest: "+getLargest(a,5));  
  
}}

function FindLargestNumberInAnArray(arr) {
  return Math.max(...arr)
}

console.log("Largest Number in array [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] is", FindLargestNumberInAnArray([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]))

function FindLargestNumberInAnArray(array: Array<number>): number | string {
  let max = 0;
  for (const num of array) {
    max = Math.max(max, num);
  }

  return max;
}

const array = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5];
console.log(`Input: [${array}]`);
const result = FindLargestNumberInAnArray(array);
console.log(`Output: ${result}`);

func findLargestNumberInAnArray(arr []int) int {
	var largest int
	for _, v := range arr {
		if v > largest {
			largest = v
		}
	}
	return largest
}
